overview: Former Assistant Vice-President Finance and Accounting at Canadian Pacific Limited where he was jointly responsible for the financial affairs of this highly diversified company, and where he gained extensive experience in mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, corporate reorganizations, and other transactions of a strategic or special nature. Mr. Bretecher is a former director of Canadian Pacific Hotels, Eastern Provincial Airways, and Canada Maritime Limited. He manages the financial, corporate, and legal affairs of the company and has over 30 years of relevant business experience. Mr. Bretecher is a Certified Management Accountant and holds an MBA from the University of Toronto.
